ctx: intros f a b lf M H1 H2 H3.
exceptions.tactic: apply (norm_RInt_le f (fun x => M) a b lf M).
exceptions.exn: In environment V : NormedModule R_AbsRing f : R -> V a, b : R lf : V M : R H1 : a <= b H2 : forall x : R, a <= x <= b -> norm (f x) <= M H3 : is_RInt f a b lf Unable to unify "norm lf <= M" with "norm lf <= (b - a) * M".

ctx: intros f a b lf M H1 H2 H3.
exceptions.exn: In environment V : NormedModule R_AbsRing H : forall (f : R -> V) (g : R -> R) (a b : R) (lf : V) (lg : R), a <= b -> (forall x : R, a <= x <= b -> norm (f x) <= g x) -> is_RInt f a b lf -> is_RInt g a b lg -> norm lf <= lg f : R -> V a, b : R lf : V M : R H1 : a <= b H3 : is_RInt f a b lf H0 : forall x : R, a <= x -> x <= b -> norm (f x) <= M Unable to unify "a <= b" with "norm lf <= (b - a) * M".

ctx: intros f a b lf M H1 H2 H3.
exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variables f, g, a, b.

ctx: intros f a b lf M H1 H2 H3.
exceptions.exn: In environment V : NormedModule R_AbsRing H : forall (f : R -> V) (g : R -> R) (a b : R) (lf : V) (lg : R), a <= b -> (forall x : R, a <= x <= b -> norm (f x) <= g x) -> is_RInt f a b lf -> is_RInt g a b lg -> norm lf <= lg f : R -> V a, b : R lf : V M : R H1 : a <= b H3 : is_RInt f a b lf H0 : forall x : R, a <= x -> x <= b -> norm (f x) <= M Unable to unify "is_RInt f a b lf" with "norm lf <= (b - a) * M".

original: intros f a b lf M H1 H2 H3. apply (norm_RInt_le f (fun x => M) a b lf M). - apply H1. - apply H2. - apply H3.
